Title: Directs the office of children and family services and the NY city administration for children's services to submit annual reports concerning information related to children served by their respective prog
Summary: Directs the office of children and family services and the New York city administration for children's services to submit annual reports concerning information related to children served by their respective programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง501, Exec L; amd ยง618, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the New York city charter, in relation to directing the office of children and family services and the New York city administration for children's services to submit annual reports concerning information related to children served by their respective programs
